title: Freelance Web Developer
descriptions: Designed and developed 10+ custom responsive WordPress websites for clients, while integrating SEO plugins to improve search visibility.
Performed ongoing maintenance for WordPress websites, including troubleshooting, implementing security measures, and monitoring performance.

title: Software System Tester
descriptions: Conducted black-box testing on mobile and web applications and reported bugs on Jira.
Visualized bug-related statistics on the Jira dashboard and conducted analyses for the development team.

title: Coding and Robotics Instructor
descriptions: Delivered Python programming, Scratch programming, and robotics lessons to students from ages 5-18 in a tutoring center and in various international schools.
Created teaching materials and assessments, and handled admistrative tasks such as emailing parents and schools.

title: Web Developer Intern
descriptions: Developed responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Drupal CMS.
Shadowed project managers in client meetings, gaining experience in communication strategies.
